tutorial_story_prologue_1: One day, you were walking down the street
tutorial_story_prologue_2: and met a glowing cat! ğŸ±âœ¨
tutorial_story_prologue_3: The cat gave you a special game and said:
tutorial_story_prologue_4: "There are many sad street cats in the fairy world.
tutorial_story_prologue_5: You can summon them with this game."
tutorial_story_mission_1: 1. ğŸ’« Summon sad cats with the game
tutorial_story_mission_2: 2. ğŸŒ± Take good care of them with love
tutorial_story_mission_3: 3. ğŸŒˆ Send healthy cats back to the fairy world
tutorial_story_mission_4: 4. â­ Collect 100 Legendary cats to save the fairy world
tutorial_story_why_1: The cats came from the fairy world,
tutorial_story_why_2: but fell to Earth because they were sad. ğŸ˜¿
tutorial_story_why_3: When you love and care for them,
tutorial_story_why_4: they can go back to the fairy world and be happy! ğŸ¡âœ¨
tutorial_story_why_5: And when you collect Legendary cats,
tutorial_story_why_6: you can calm down the naughty cats
tutorial_story_why_7: and bring peace to the fairy world. ğŸŒŸ
tutorial_home_content: ğŸ  Welcome to the Cat Fairy Club! Tap each button to play with the cats âœ¨
tutorial_home_bullet_1: ğŸ° Gacha: Meet new cats (5 free tries per day!)
tutorial_home_bullet_2: ğŸ“¦ Collection: Take care of your cats
tutorial_home_bullet_3: ğŸŒŸ Return: Send cats back to the fairy world
tutorial_home_bullet_4: âš”ï¸ Battle: Battle with friends and your cats
tutorial_home_bullet_5: ğŸª„ Magic Wand: Play a card game with cat cards
tutorial_home_bullet_6: ğŸ—ºï¸ Search: Find fairy cats near you
tutorial_home_bullet_7: ğŸ† Ranking: Check the best scores
tutorial_gacha_content: ğŸ° Spin the gacha to meet new cats! Tap "Spin Gacha" button (5 free tries per day!) ğŸ
tutorial_gacha_bullet_1: Rarity: C(gray) â†’ UC(green) â†’ R(blue) â†’ SR(red) â†’ UR(gold) â†’ LG(purple)
tutorial_gacha_bullet_3: Ticket System: You get 5 free tickets every night at midnight â°
tutorial_gacha_bullet_4: Result: Your new cat goes to the Main Pool ğŸ“¦
tutorial_gacha_hint: ğŸ’¡ Tip: Tap a cat card to see more details
tutorial_collection_content: ğŸ“¦ This is where you take care of all your cats! You can drag cats to move them between pools ğŸ”„
tutorial_collection_bullet_1: ğŸ½ï¸ Feed All: Give food to all cats at once (Friendship +5, Happiness +5, Energy +20)
tutorial_collection_bullet_2: ğŸ  Move Pools: Press and drag a cat to move it
tutorial_collection_bullet_3: Main Pool (200 cats): Where cats live together
tutorial_collection_bullet_4: Battle Pool (3 cats): Cats for battles
tutorial_collection_bullet_5: Reward Pool (30 cats): Cats you caught in battles
tutorial_collection_bullet_6: Adoption Pool (20 cats): Cats ready to say goodbye
tutorial_collection_bullet_7: ğŸ± Get magic power when you adopt cats (C:10 / UC:20 / R:50 / SR:100 / UR:200 / LG:500)
tutorial_collection_hint:
ğŸ’¡ Tip 1: Tap a cat to go to the care screen
ğŸ’¡ Tip 2: If you have many cats, use the Feed All button
ğŸ’¡ Tip 3: Legendary (LG) cats ask you before adoption!
ğŸ’¡ Tip 4: Cats in Adoption Pool leave after 2 days ğŸ‘‹
tutorial_care_content: ğŸ’• When you take care of cats, their friendship and happiness go up! Tap the buttons below to care for your cat ğŸ±
tutorial_care_bullet_6: â° You can do each action once every 24 hours!
tutorial_care_bullet_7: ğŸ’– Friendship: How much the cat loves you
tutorial_care_bullet_8: ğŸ˜Š Happiness: How happy the cat feels
tutorial_care_bullet_9: âš¡ Energy: How active the cat is
tutorial_care_bullet_10: ğŸ“‰ All stats go down a little every night at midnight (Rarer cats go down slower!)
tutorial_care_hint: ğŸ’¡ Tip: When all stats are 100, your cat is "Perfect" and shows up in rankings!
tutorial_return_content: ğŸŒŸ Send 2 or more cats of the same rarity (with Friendship, Happiness, and Energy all 90+) to summon a higher rarity cat! Select cats and tap "Return to Fairy World" âœ¨
tutorial_return_bullet_1: ğŸ² Chance to summon a higher rarity cat: 2 cats(40%) / 3 cats(60%) / 4 cats(80%) / 5 cats(100% guaranteed!) Up to +8% level bonus!
tutorial_return_bullet_2: ğŸ’° Don't worry if you fail! You get magic power (C:20 / UC:80 / R:200 / SR:400 / UR:600)
tutorial_return_bullet_3: ğŸ“‹ How to select cats: 1. Tap a rarity tab â†’ 2. Select 2~5 cats â†’ 3. Check success chance â†’ 4. Tap "Return to Fairy World"!
tutorial_return_hint:
ğŸ’¡ Tip 1: 5 cats = 100% success!
ğŸ’¡ Tip 2: Higher rarity cats are harder to collect, so think carefully!
ğŸ’¡ Tip 3: Selected cats disappear whether you succeed or fail
tutorial_battle_setup_content: âš”ï¸ Choose 3 cats for battle! Tap cats in your Battle Pool (exactly 3 cats!) ğŸ±ğŸ±ğŸ±
tutorial_battle_setup_bullet_1: ğŸ¯ Battle cat tips: Choose scissors/rock/paper evenly
tutorial_battle_setup_bullet_3: Higher rarity cats have special effects!
tutorial_battle_setup_bullet_4: ğŸ’ª Cat types: âœ‚ï¸ Scissors / ğŸª¨ Rock / ğŸ“„ Paper (game attribute)
tutorial_battle_setup_bullet_5: ğŸ—¡ï¸ Items: Attack, defense, dodge, and heal effects
tutorial_battle_setup_bullet_6: ğŸ›¡ï¸ Possessions: Attack, defense, dodge, and heal effects
tutorial_battle_setup_hint:
ğŸ’¡ Tip 1: If your Battle Pool is empty, move cats from Collection screen!
ğŸ’¡ Tip 2: Tap cat cards to see details
ğŸ’¡ Tip 3: When you select 3 cats, the "Go to Battle Lobby" button appears
tutorial_battle_lobby_content: ğŸŸï¸ Create or join a room to battle with friends! When you create a room, you get a 6-digit code ğŸ“±
tutorial_battle_lobby_bullet_1: ğŸ® Way 1ï¸âƒ£ - Create Room: 1. Tap "Create Room" â†’ 2. Give the 6-digit code to your friend â†’ 3. Wait for friend to join
tutorial_battle_lobby_bullet_2: ğŸ® Way 2ï¸âƒ£ - Join Room: 1. Enter code from friend â†’ 2. Tap "Join Room" â†’ 3. Game starts!
tutorial_battle_lobby_bullet_3: ğŸ® Way 3ï¸âƒ£ - Quick Join: 1. Tap a waiting room â†’ 2. Game starts!
tutorial_battle_lobby_bullet_4: ğŸ“‹ Room info: ğŸ‘¤ Host name, ğŸ”¢ Room code, â° Created time (auto-deleted after 30 min)
tutorial_battle_lobby_hint:
ğŸ’¡ Tip 1: You can only make 1 room at a time. You can't join your own room
ğŸ’¡ Tip 2: The host sees a "âš”ï¸" icon on the home screen when a friend joins
ğŸ’¡ Tip 3: Rooms disappear if no game starts for 30 minutes
tutorial_battle_game_content: âš”ï¸ Pick 1 cat in 10 seconds! Play rock-paper-scissors âœ‚ï¸ğŸª¨ğŸ“„
tutorial_battle_game_bullet_1: ğŸ¯ Battle rules: âœ‚ï¸ Scissors beats ğŸ“„ Paper / ğŸª¨ Rock beats âœ‚ï¸ Scissors / ğŸ“„ Paper beats ğŸª¨ Rock
tutorial_battle_game_bullet_2: ğŸ’¥ Basic damage: 30 / ğŸ›¡ï¸ Starting HP: 120 (you lose when it reaches 0!)
tutorial_battle_game_bullet_3: â±ï¸ Pick time: 10 seconds (time out = random pick)
tutorial_battle_game_bullet_4: ğŸ Item effects: Attack, defense, dodge, and heal
tutorial_battle_game_bullet_5: ğŸ›¡ï¸ Possession effects: Attack, defense, dodge, and heal
tutorial_battle_game_bullet_6: ğŸ“Š Damage calculation: Basic damage â†’ Item/Possession bonus â†’ Final HP
tutorial_battle_game_bullet_7: ğŸ“º Round result screen: Which cats fought, rock-paper-scissors result, effects, HP change (auto next round after 5 sec)
tutorial_battle_game_hint:
ğŸ’¡ Tip 1: Use effects well to turn the battle around!
ğŸ’¡ Tip 2: Remember which cats your opponent uses often
ğŸ’¡ Tip 3: Some effects work even on ties
tutorial_battle_result_content: ğŸ† The battle is over! Check your rewards!
tutorial_battle_result_bullet_1: ğŸ Win rewards: â­ 50 EXP (level up!), ğŸ’° 200 magic power
tutorial_battle_result_bullet_2: ğŸ± Copy opponent cat chance: C(100%) / UC(50%) / R(25%) / SR(12%) / UR(6%) / LG(3%)
tutorial_battle_result_bullet_3: ğŸ’ª Lose rewards: â­ 50 EXP, ğŸ’° 100 magic power (you get rewards even if you lose!)
tutorial_battle_result_bullet_4: ğŸ¤ Tie: â­ 10 EXP, ğŸ’° 20 magic power
tutorial_battle_result_bullet_5: ğŸ² What is copy cat? A chance to copy (capture) the losing cat! If you succeed, it goes to Reward Pool
tutorial_battle_result_hint:
ğŸ’¡ Tip 1: Battle records reset every month
ğŸ’¡ Tip 2: Check this month's win rate in Rankings
ğŸ’¡ Tip 3: Your Battle Pool cats stay after the game
tutorial_gostop_lobby_content: ğŸ± Magic Wand Collection! (Cat card game) Play cards with friends and bet magic power ğŸ²
tutorial_gostop_lobby_bullet_1: ğŸ± What is Magic Wand Collection? A 2-player game with 48 cat cards. Collect matching cat cards to get points
tutorial_gostop_lobby_bullet_2: When you get 3 points, choose "Go" or "Stop"! Win and take your opponent's magic power ğŸ’°
tutorial_gostop_lobby_bullet_4: ğŸ® Way 1ï¸âƒ£ - Create Room: 1. Tap "Create Room" â†’ 2. Give 6-digit code to friend â†’ 3. Wait for friend
tutorial_gostop_lobby_bullet_5: ğŸ® Way 2ï¸âƒ£ - Join Room: 1. Enter code or tap room in list â†’ 2. Game starts!
tutorial_gostop_lobby_hint:
ğŸ’¡ Tip 1: Try practice mode first to learn the rules
ğŸ’¡ Tip 2: Don't worry if you don't know! We'll teach you during the game
ğŸ’¡ Tip 3: You can only make 1 room at a time
tutorial_gostop_game_content: ğŸ± Match cat cards with the same background and shape to get points! Double-click a card â†’ auto-match floor cards â†’ auto-draw 1 card â†’ auto-match floor cards âœ¨
tutorial_gostop_game_bullet_1: ğŸ¯ How to play: Step 1: Pick a card from your hand â†’ Step 2: Match with same background on floor (or add to floor if no match) â†’ Step 3: Auto-draw 1 card â†’ Step 4: Auto-match with floor if same background! (ğŸ’¡ Hover over any card to make it bigger!)
tutorial_gostop_game_bullet_2: ğŸ± 5 types of cat cards: â­ Magic Wand (bright): Special cats with magic wands! / ğŸ€ Pretty (ribbon): Cute ribbon and eye patch cards / ğŸ¨ Cool (ten): Bandana, scouter, goggles, bell collar cards / ğŸŒ¸ Feeling (plain): Happy or angry cat cards
tutorial_gostop_game_bullet_3: ğŸ“Š Points: â­ Magic Wand(3 cards=3 points, 5 cards=15 points!) / ğŸ€ Pretty(1 point from 5 cards, 3 points if you collect all same type!) / ğŸ¨ Cool(1 point from 5 cards, 5 points if you collect all bandanas!) / ğŸŒ¸ Feeling(1 point from 10 cards, moon and candy cats count as 2)
tutorial_gostop_game_bullet_4: ğŸ² What is Go/Stop? You can choose when you have 3+ points! ğŸ“› Stop: End game and win / ğŸ”„ Go: Keep playing (1 go=2x, 2 go=4x, 3 go=8x, 4 go=16x) âš ï¸ Warning: If you call Go and opponent comes back, you lose! Choose carefully!
tutorial_gostop_game_bullet_5: ğŸŒŸ Special combos (bonus points): ğŸŒˆ 5 Magic Wands(+15 points) / âœ¨ 4 Magic Wands(+4 points, except playground kidnapper cube wand) / ğŸ’« 3 Magic Wands(+3 points, except playground kidnapper cube wand) / ğŸ¦œ Bandana(3 bandana cool cats, +5 points) / ğŸ”´ Red Ribbon(3 red ribbon pretty cats, +3 points) / ğŸ”µ Pink Ribbon(3 pink ribbon pretty cats, +3 points) / ğŸŸ¡ Cute Eyepatch(3 cute eyepatch pretty cats, +3 points)
tutorial_gostop_game_bullet_6: ğŸ’° Magic power: Points Ã— 20 Ã— Multiplier (Examples: 3 points with stop=60 magic power, 5 points with 1 go=200 magic power, 7 points with 2 go=560 magic power) ğŸ¯ High score tip: Try to get many combos at once!
tutorial_gostop_game_hint:
ğŸ’¡ Tip 1: Auto-draw when your hand is empty
ğŸ’¡ Tip 2: Your collected cards are sorted above your hand. Click to see them.
ğŸ’¡ Tip 3: Check what your opponent took! Click the collected cards at the top of the screen.
ğŸ’¡ Tip 4: Game auto-ends when deck is empty
ğŸ’¡ Tip 5: Watch out for moon and candy cats (count as 2 feeling cards)! Opponent can take them
tutorial_exploration_content: ğŸ—ºï¸ Find cats on the map! Cat markers appear near your location ğŸ“
tutorial_exploration_bullet_1: ğŸ—ºï¸ How to use map: ğŸ–±ï¸ Drag(move map), ğŸ” Pinch/Scroll(zoom in/out), ğŸ“ Blue dot(your location), ğŸ± Cat markers(cats you found)
tutorial_exploration_bullet_2: âœ¨ How to summon cats: 1ï¸âƒ£ Check magic power(PC:250, Mobile:200) â†’ 2ï¸âƒ£ Tap "Summon Cats" â†’ 3ï¸âƒ£ Cat markers appear on map!(PC:2~3 cats, Mobile:1~3 cats) â†’ 4ï¸âƒ£ Click marker to collect(PC:just click, Mobile:walk within 10m)
tutorial_exploration_bullet_3: ğŸ¨ Marker colors: âš« C(gray-common) / ğŸŸ¢ UC(green-uncommon) / ğŸ”µ R(blue-rare) / ğŸ”´ SR(red-super rare) / ğŸŸ¡ UR(gold-ultra rare) / ğŸŸ£ LG(purple-legendary!)
tutorial_exploration_hint:
ğŸ’¡ Tip 1: Allow GPS permission to see your exact location
ğŸ’¡ Tip 2: Cats you find on the map go to Main Pool automatically
ğŸ’¡ Tip 3: If you need magic power, get it from battles or adoption!
ğŸ’¡ Tip 4: On mobile, you need to actually walk ğŸƒ
tutorial_profile_content: ğŸ‘¤ Check your information and records here! Tap your nickname to change it âœï¸
tutorial_profile_bullet_1: ğŸ“Š Basic info: ğŸ‘¤ Nickname(name others see), â­ Level(goes up with EXP), ğŸ’° Magic power(for search and trades), ğŸŸï¸ Gacha tickets(5 tickets every day)

tutorial_profile_bullet_4: âœï¸ How to change nickname: 1. Tap nickname â†’ 2. Enter new name (2~50 characters) â†’ 3. Tap "Save"
tutorial_profile_hint:
ğŸ’¡ Tip 1: Battle to level up

ğŸ’¡ Tip 3: Stats reset on the 1st of every month
tutorial_ranking_content: ğŸ† Show off your best records! Tap tabs to see other rankings ğŸ¯
tutorial_ranking_bullet_1: ğŸ“Š 4 rankings: ğŸŒŸ Collection ranking(rarest cats, higher rarity score = higher rank!) / ğŸ’• Care ranking(perfect cat count, more perfect cats = higher rank!) / âš”ï¸ Battle ranking(this month's win rate, more wins and higher rate = higher rank!) / ğŸ’° Magic power ranking(magic power count, more power = higher rank!)
tutorial_ranking_bullet_2: ğŸ–ï¸ Ranking rules: Shows top 20, resets on 1st of month at midnight (except collection/care), top 3 get medals(ğŸ¥‡ 1st / ğŸ¥ˆ 2nd / ğŸ¥‰ 3rd)
tutorial_ranking_bullet_3: ğŸ“± Your rank: Shows if you're in top 20. Not in rankings yet? Keep playing!
tutorial_ranking_hint:
ğŸ’¡ Tip 1: Pull down to refresh!
ğŸ’¡ Tip 2: Try to get 1st place in each category
ğŸ’¡ Tip 3: Collection and care keep building up
ğŸ’¡ Tip 4: Battle and magic power compete every month!
